original: While wrapped in a blanket, you have Advantage on saving throws against extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master ’s Guide).
translation: 包裹在毯子中期间，你在抵抗极寒的豁免检定上具有优势（详见地下城主指南）。

original: If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 如果你没有喝足够的水，你就有风险陷入 &Reference[脱水] 状态。

original: A Tinderbox is a small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a Candle, Lamp, Lantern, or Torch—or anything else with exposed fuel—takes a Bonus Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.
translation: 火绒盒是一种装有打火石、火镰和火绒（通常是浸泡在燃油里的干布料）的小型容器，其中的物品可以用来点火。你可以使用附赠动作来用它点燃任何具有燃料的东西——例如蜡烛、油灯或火把。在没有燃料的情况下生火需要 1 分钟时间。

original:
As a Utilize action, you can tie a knot with Rope if you succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. The Rope can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check.

You can bind an unwilling creature with the Rope only if the creature has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition. If the creature’s legs are bound, the creature has the Restrained condition until it escapes. Escaping the Rope requires the creature to make a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check as an action.
translation:
以一个利用动作，你可以进行一次DC 10 的敏捷（巧手）检定。如果该检定成功，你能用绳索打一个结。扯坏绳索需要通过一次DC 20 的力量（运动）检定。

你可以利用绳索捆住一个非自愿生物，但该生物必须处于 &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated] 或 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。如果你绑住了该生物的腿，该生物陷入束缚状态，直至挣脱。挣脱绳索需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC 15 的敏捷（特技）检定。

original: A Waterskin holds up to 4 pints. If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 水袋具有 4 品脱容量。如果你喝水不足，你会遭受 &Reference[dehydration] 的危害（见规则详述）。

original: Rations consist of travel-ready food, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts. See &Reference[Malnutrition] in the rules glossary for the risks of not eating.
translation: 口粮由适合长途旅行携带的食物组成，包含肉干、风干水果、饼干和坚果等。不进食的危害详见术语汇编中的 &Reference[Malnutrition] 部分。

original: This cylindrical leather case can hold up to ten rolled-up sheets of paper or five rolled-up sheets of parchment.
translation: 一个地图或卷轴匣至多能存放 10 张纸张或 5 张羊皮纸。

original:
You can douse a creature, object, or space with Oil or use it as fuel, as detailed below.

Dousing a Creature or an Object. When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing an Oil flask. Target one creature or object within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or be covered in oil. If the target takes Fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an extra [[/damage 5 type=fire]] damage from burning oil.

Dousing a Space. You can take the Utilize action to pour an Oil flask on level ground to cover a 5-foot-square area within 5 feet of yourself. If lit, the oil burns until the end of the turn 2 rounds from when the oil was lit (or 12 seconds) and deals 5 Fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn there. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Fuel. Oil serves as fuel for Lamps and Lanterns. Once lit, a flask of Oil burns for 6 hours in a Lamp or Lantern. That duration doesn’t need to be consecutive; you can extinguish the burning Oil (as a Utilize action) and rekindle it again until it has burned for a total of 6 hours.
translation:
你能将燃油泼在一个生物、物件或一处空间上，你也可以将燃油作为燃料使用。具体使用方法如下。

泼洒一个生物或一个物件。 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶燃油。你可以选择位于你 20 尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则被燃油覆盖。如果目标在燃油挥发前（1 分钟后）受到任何火焰伤害，则目标因燃烧的燃油受到额外[[/damage 5 type=fire]]伤害。

泼洒一处空。 以一个利用动作，你可以将一扁瓶燃油泼在地面上，以覆盖一块边长 5 尺且保持水平的方形区域。点燃后，从点燃时算起，燃油会持续燃烧两轮并在回合结束时熄灭（或 12 秒）。点燃时，任何进入该区域或在该区域结束其回合的生物都会受到 5 点火焰伤害。同一生物每回合只受该伤害作用一次。

燃料。 燃油能作为油灯和提灯的燃料使用。一旦点着，一扁瓶的燃油可以在油灯和提灯中持续燃烧 6 小时。持续时长并不需要是连续的，你可以熄灭点着的燃油（以一个利用动作），并在之后再点燃，直到总共燃烧了 6 小时。

original: A Bedroll sleeps one Small or Medium creature. While in a Bedroll, you automatically succeed on saving throws against extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master ’s Guide).
translation: 一卷铺盖能睡下一个小型或中型生物。躺在铺盖中时，你自动通过抵抗极寒的豁免检定（详见地下城主指南）。

original: One sheet of Parchment can hold about 250 handwritten words.
translation: 一页羊皮纸能够写满 250 个手写单词。

original: A hooded lantern casts bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil. As an action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to dim light in a 5-foot radius.
translation: 一盏附盖提灯使用燃油作为燃料，点着时能够发出 30 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 30 尺的微光光照。以一个附赠动作，你可以盖上或掀开提灯的盖子。盖上盖子时，提灯的光亮降至半径 5 尺的微光光照。

original: A Lamp burns @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil} as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.
translation: 一盏油灯使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000] 作为燃料，点着时能够发出 15 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 30 尺的微光光照。

original: When rung as a Utilize action, a Bell produces a sound that can be heard up to 60 feet away.
translation: 以一个利用动作，你可以摇响一个铃铛，铃铛会发出 60 尺内都能够听到的声音。

original: A bullseye lantern casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.
translation: 一盏油灯使用燃油作为燃料，点着时能够发出 60 尺远锥形的明亮光照和额外 60 尺远的微光光照。

original:
As a Utilize action, you can spill Ball Bearings from their pouch. They spread to cover a level, 10-foot-square area within 10 feet of yourself. A creature that enters this area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or have the &Reference[Prone] condition. It takes 10 minutes to recover the Ball Bearings.

Foundry Note

The Recover Ball Bearings activity grants another use of this item.
translation:
以一个利用动作，你能把一小包滚珠撒至地面，并覆盖你周围 10 尺内的一处 10 尺方形区域。任何生物每回合首次进入这片区域时都必须通过一次DC 10 的敏捷豁免，否则将陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。重新收集这些滚珠需要花费 10 分钟时间。

Foundry Note

The 回收滚珠行动可让该物品再使用一次。

original: A Torch burns for 1 hour, casting Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. When you take the Attack action, you can attack with the Torch, using it as a Simple Melee weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1 Fire damage.
translation: 火把点燃后能够燃烧 1 小时，燃烧期间发出 20 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 20 尺的微光光照。当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将火把当作简易近战武器，并使用火把发动攻击。命中时，目标受到 1 点火焰伤害。

original: Using a Crowbar gives you Advantage on Strength checks where the Crowbar’s leverage can be applied.
translation: 使用撬棍时，在撬棍的杠杆作用下，将给你在力量检定上优势。

original: A handheld steel Mirror is useful for personal cosmetics but also for peeking around corners and reflecting light as a signal.
translation: 手持式钢制镜子不仅适用于个人化妆，还可以用来窥视角落和反射光线作为信号。

original: Ink comes in a 1-ounce bottle, which provides enough ink to write about 500 pages.
translation: 墨水一般装在1盎司的瓶子里，足够撰写500页的内容。

original: As a Utilize action, you can spread Caltrops from their bag to cover a 5-foot-square area within 5 feet of yourself. A creature that enters this area for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 1 Piercing damage and have its Speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. It takes 10 minutes to recover the Caltrops.
translation: 以一个利用动作，你能把一包铁蒺撒至地面并覆盖你周围 5 尺内的一处 5 尺方形区域。任何生物每回合首次进入这片区域时都必须通过一次DC 15 的敏捷豁免，否则将受到 1 点穿刺伤害，并且移速降至 0，直到其下一回合开始为止。重新收集这些铁蒺藜需要花费 10 分钟时间。

original: A Robe has vocational or ceremonial significance. Some events and locations admit only people wearing a Robe bearing certain colors or symbols.
translation: 长袍通常具有特别的职业或仪式意义。有些活动和场合仅允许穿着带有特定颜色或符号的长袍的人参与。

original: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Holy Water. Target one creature you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d8 Radiant damage if it is a Fiend or an Undead.
translation: 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶圣水。你可以选择位于你 20 尺内可见的一个生物作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），并且如果这个目标是邪魔或亡灵生物，失败时将承受 2d8 点光耀伤害。

original: While wearing a Costume, you have Advantage on any ability check you make to impersonate the person or type of person it represents.
translation: 若你穿着对应的戏服，你为模仿他人或模仿某一类人所作的任何属性检定都具有优势。

original: A collection of maps bound in an ebony cover that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.
translation: 一套黑檀木封皮的星图集可以被星辰结社德鲁伊当作法器使用。这是一个微型物件。

original: A crystal engraved with starry patterns that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.
translation: 一块刻有星图的水晶可以被星辰结社德鲁伊当作法器使用。这是一个微型物件。

original: A glass disk etched with constellations that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.
translation: 一面蚀刻着星座排列的玻璃圆盘可以被星辰结社德鲁伊当作法器使用。这是一个微型物件。

original: An owlbear hide tooled with stellar symbols that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.
translation: 一块有着星星符号压花的枭雄皮可以被星辰结社德鲁伊当作法器使用。这是一个微型物件。
一张布满星座图列的卷轴

original: A scroll bearing depictions of constellations that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.
translation: 一张布满星座图列的卷轴可以被星辰结社德鲁伊当作法器使用。这是一个微型物件。

original: A stone tablet with fine holes drilled through it that can be used as a Spellcasting Focus by Circle of the Star Druids. It is a Tiny object.
translation: 一块钻有细孔的石板可以被星辰结社德鲁伊当作法器使用。这是一个微型物件。

original: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

original: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

original: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

original:
An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

This item also functions as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{Quarterstaff}

Foundry Note

This item has been configured with the additional properties of a Quarterstaff.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

这个物品也可以作为一个 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepQuartersta]{长棍}使用

Foundry Note

该物品已配置长棍的额外属性。

original: An @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{Arcane Focus} is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagArcaneFocus]{奥术法器}是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

original: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a vial of Acid. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d6 Acid damage.
translation: 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一小瓶强酸。你可以选择位于你 20 尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则承受 2d6 点强酸伤害。

original: When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Alchemist’s Fire. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take [[/damage 1d4 type=fire]] damage and start &Reference[burning].
translation: 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶炽火胶。你可以选择位于你 20 尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），否则承受 1d4 点火焰伤害并开始燃烧

original:
Ammunition is required by a weapon that has the Ammunition property. A weapon’s description specifies the type of ammunition used by the weapon. The Ammunition table lists the different types and the amount you get when you buy them. The table also lists the item that is typically used to store each type; storage must be bought separately.

Ammunition
TypeAmountStorageWeightCost

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBolts00000]{Bolts}20@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaseCrossbo]{Case}1½ lb.1 GP

具有弹药属性的武器需要弹药才能发射。武器的描述部分会指定这把武器需要哪种弹药。下面的弹药表列出了不同类型的弹药，以及购买这些弹药时一份能买到多少枚。列表还会列出这些弹药通常需要哪种容器存放；容器必须要单独购买。

弹药

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbamoBulletsSli]{投石索弹丸}20@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPouch000000]{小包}1.5磅4 CP

original: As a Bonus Action, you can drink a vial of Antitoxin to gain Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Poisoned condition for 1 hour.
translation: 作为一次附赠动作，你可以喝下一小瓶解毒剂以获得接下来1小时内对防止或终止中毒状态的豁免检定优势。

original:
An Arcane Focus takes one of the forms in the Arcane Focuses table and is bejeweled or carved to channel arcane magic. A Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard can use such an item as a Spellcasting Focus.

Arcane Focuses
FocusWeightCost

奥术法器是一种利用宝石或是雕刻来引导奥术魔法的物品，它会以下列奥术法器列表中的一种形式存在。术士、魔契师和法师可以使用这种物品作为法器。

original: A Backpack holds up to 30 pounds within 1 cubic foot. It can also serve as a saddlebag.
translation: 一个背包最多能装入 30 磅重、1 立方尺大的东西。背包也能当作鞍囊使用。

original: A Barrel holds up to 40 gallons of liquid or up to 4 cubic feet of dry goods.
translation: 一个木桶能够至多装入 40 加仑的液体或 4 立方尺的干燥货物。

original: A Basket holds up to 40 pounds within 2 cubic feet.
translation: 一个篮子能够至多装入 40 磅重、2 立方尺大的东西。

original: A Block and Tackle allows you to hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.
translation: 一个滑轮组可以让你吊起的重量达到你正常能举起重量的四倍。

original: A Book contains fiction or nonfiction. If you consult an accurate nonfiction Book about its topic, you gain a +5 bonus to Intelligence (Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion) checks you make about that topic.
translation: 一本书包含小说或非小说内容。如果你查阅关于其主题的准确非小说书籍，你在关于该主题的智力（奥秘、历史、自然、或宗教）检查中获得 +5 的加值。

original: A Glass Bottle holds up to 1½ pints.
translation: 一个玻璃瓶可以容纳最多1.5品脱。

original: A Bucket holds up to half a cubic foot of contents.
translation: 一个桶可以容纳最多0.5立方尺的内容物。

original: A Burglar’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBallBearing]{Ball Bearings}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, 10 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCandle00000]{Candles}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.wjHtGnd05SPdURqE]{Hooded Lantern}, 7 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{flasks of Oil}, 5 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.
translation: 窃贼套组包含以下物品：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBallBearing], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000], 10 根 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCandle00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLanternHood], 7 扁瓶 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000], 5 天份 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]。

original: For 1 hour, a lit Candle sheds Bright Light in a 5-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 5 feet.
translation: 一根蜡烛可以燃烧 1 小时，并发出 5 尺范围的明亮光照，以及额外 5 尺的微光光照。

original:
A Spell Scroll (Cantrip) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSpellScroll]{Spell Scroll (Level 1)} is a magic item that bears the words of a cantrip or level 1 spell, respectively, determined by the scroll’s creator. If the spell is on your class’s spell list, you can read the scroll and cast the spell using its normal casting time and without providing any Material components.

If the spell requires a saving throw or an attack roll, the spell save DC is 13, and the attack bonus is +5. The scroll disintegrates when the casting is completed.
translation:
法术卷轴 (戏法) 或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagSpellScroll]{法术卷轴(1环)}是一件带有戏法或1环法术文字的魔法物品，由卷轴的创造者决定。如果该法术在你的职业法术列表上你可以阅读卷轴并使用其正常的施法时间施放法术，而无需提供任何材料成分。

如果法术需要进行豁免检定或攻击检定，法术豁免DC为13，攻击加值为+5。卷轴在施法完成后会解体。

original: A Crossbow Bolt Case holds up to 20 Bolts.
translation: 一个弩矢匣可以装下最多20支箭。

original: A Map or Scroll Case holds up to 10 sheets of paper or 5 sheets of parchment.
translation: 一个地图或卷轴盒可以容纳多达10张纸或5张羊皮纸。

original: As a Utilize action, you can wrap a Chain around an unwilling creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition if you succeed on a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check. If the creature’s legs are bound, the creature has the Restrained condition until it escapes. Escaping the Chain requires the creature to make a successful DC 18 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check as an action. Bursting the Chain requires a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check as an action.
translation: 以一个交互动作，你可以进行一次DC13的力量（运动）检定。如果该检定成功，你能利用链条捆住一个位于你5尺内的非自愿生物，但该生物必须处于受擒、失能或束缚状态。如果你绑住了该生物的腿，该生物陷入束缚状态，直至挣脱。挣脱链条需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC18的敏捷（体操）检定。扯坏链条需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC20的力量（运动）检定。

original: A Chest holds up to 12 cubic feet of contents.
translation: 一个箱子可以容纳最多12立方尺的内容物。

original: A Climber’s Kit includes boot tips, gloves, pitons, and a harness. As a Utilize action, you can use the Climber’s Kit to anchor yourself; when you do, you can’t fall more than 25 feet from the anchor point, and you can’t move more than 25 feet from there without undoing the anchor as a Bonus Action.
translation: 攀爬工具包包括靴尖、手套、岩钉和安全带。作为一个交互动作，你可以使用攀爬工具包来固定自己；当你这样做时，你从锚点掉落的距离不会超过25尺，而且你不能在不解除锚点的情况下移动超过25尺，解除锚点需要作为一个附赠动作

original: Fine Clothes are made of expensive fabrics and adorned with expertly crafted details. Some events and locations admit only people wearing these clothes.
translation: 高档服装使用昂贵的材料和装饰物制成，并缝制着极其精密的细节。有些活动和场合仅允许穿着高档服装的人参与。

original: Traveler’s Clothes are resilient garments designed for travel in various environments.
translation: 旅行者服装是为在各种环境中旅行而设计的耐用衣物。

original: A Component Pouch is watertight and filled with compartments that hold all the free Material components of your spells.
translation: 法术材料包是防水的，并且装有隔间，可以存放你法术所需的所有免费材料成分。

original: A Diplomat’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagChest000000]{Chest}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.FqFmdzIBUSxFKKfi]{Fine Clothes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000]{Ink}, 5 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInkPen00000]{Ink Pens}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.5mIeX824uMklU3xq]{Map or Scroll Cases}, 4 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{flasks of Oil}, 5 sheets of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPaper000000]{Paper}, 5 sheets of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00]{Parchment}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000]{Perfume}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.
translation: 外交套组包含以下物品： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagChest000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.FqFmdzIBUSxFKKfi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000], 5 支 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInkPen00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000], 2 个 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.5mIeX824uMklU3xq], 4 扁瓶 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000], 5 张 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPaper000000], 5 张 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]。

original:
A Druidic Focus takes one of the forms in the Druidic Focuses table and is carved, tied with ribbon, or painted to channel primal magic. A Druid or Ranger can use such an object as a Spellcasting Focus.

original: A Dungeoneer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaltrops000]{Caltrops}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}, 2 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 10 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, 10 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torches}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.

translation: 探索套组包含以下物品：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000], 2 扁瓶 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000], 10 天份 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00], 10 根 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]。

original: As a Utilize action, you can throw the Grappling Hook at a railing, a ledge, or another catch within 50 feet of yourself, and the hook catches on if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check. If you tied a Rope to the hook, you can then climb it.
translation: 作为交互动作，你可以将抓钩投掷到距离你50尺内的栏杆、壁架或其他固定物上，如果你成功通过了DC 13的敏捷（体操）检定，钩子就会勾住。如果你将绳子绑在钩子上，那么你可以攀爬绳子。

original: A Healer’s Kit has ten uses. As a Utilize action, you can expend one of its uses to stabilize an Unconscious creature that has 0 Hit Points without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.
translation: 一个医疗包可以使用 10 次。以一个利用动作，你可以花费一次使用次数用来稳定一名生命值为 0 的昏迷生物的伤势。你这么做时无需进行感知（医疗）检定。

original:
A Holy Symbol takes one of the forms in the Holy Symbol table and is bejeweled or painted to channel divine magic. A Cleric or Paladin can use a Holy Symbol as a Spellcasting Focus.

The table indicates whether a Holy Symbol needs to be held, worn, or borne on fabric (such as a tabard or banner) or a Shield.

Holy Symbols
SymbolWeightCost
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyAmuletworn]{Amulet} (worn or held)1 lb.5 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyEmblemborn]{Emblem} (borne on fabric or a Shield)—5 GP
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyReliquaryh]{Reliquary} (held)2 lb.5 GP

圣徽是一种利用宝石或图画来引导神术魔法的物品，它会以下列圣徽列表中的一种形式存在。

列表还会向玩家展示不同圣徽所需要的携带方式，例如手持、佩戴或挂载到织物上（例如披挂或横幅）或盾牌上。

圣徽 Holy Symbols
徽章 重量 价格

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbhsyReliquaryh](手持) 2 磅 5 GP

original: As a Utilize action, you can set a Hunting Trap, which is a sawtooth steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 Piercing damage and have its Speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals [[/damage 1 type=piercing]] damage to the trapped creature.
translation: 作为一次交互动作，你可以设置一个狩猎陷阱，这是一个带有锯齿的钢环，当生物踩到中心的压力板时会突然闭合。陷阱通过一条重链固定在不动的物体上，比如树或打入地面的钉子。踩到压力板的生物必须成功通过一次DC 13的敏捷豁免，否则将受到1d4穿刺伤害，并且其速度降低到0，直到其下一回合开始。直到生物摆脱陷阱，它的移动受到链条长度（通常是3尺）的限制。生物可以使用它的动作来进行一次DC 13的力量（运动）检定，成功则可以释放自己或它触及范围内的另一生物。每次失败的检定都会对被困生物造成[[/damage 1 type=piercing]]伤害。

original: Using Ink, an Ink Pen is used to write or draw.
translation: 墨水笔可以使用墨水来写字或绘画。

original: A Ladder is 10 feet tall. You must climb to move up or down it.
translation: 一把梯子有 10 尺高。你只能在梯子上爬上或是爬下。

original: A Bullseye Lantern burns Oil as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 60-foot Cone and Dim Light for an additional 60 feet.
translation: 一盏牛眼提灯可以为前方60尺的锥状区域提供明亮光照，以及该范围外60尺的微光光照。

original: A Hooded Lantern burns Oil as fuel to cast Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet. As a Bonus Action, you can lower the hood, reducing the light to Dim Light in a 5-foot radius, or raise it again.
translation: 一盏附盖提灯使用燃油作为燃料，点着时能够发出 30 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 30 尺的微光光照。以一个附赠动作，你可以盖上或掀开提灯的盖子。盖上盖子时，提灯的光亮降至半径 5 尺的微光光照。

original: A Lock comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulThievesToo]{Thieves’ Tools} to pick this Lock with a successful [[/tool thief dex 15]] check.
translation: 一把锁配有一把钥匙。没有钥匙的情况下，生物可以使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulThievesToo]来尝试打开这把锁，需要成功进行一次[[/tool thief dex 15]] 检定

original: A Magnifying Glass grants Advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect a highly detailed item. Lighting a fire with a Magnifying Glass requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite.
translation: 放大镜在进行任何细致地评估或检查物品的属性检定时提供优势。使用放大镜点火需要与阳光一样亮的光线来聚焦，需要火绒来点燃，并且大约需要5分钟才能点燃火。

original:
As a Utilize action, you can use Manacles to bind an unwilling Small or Medium creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition if you succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. While bound, a creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls, and the creature is Restrained if the Manacles are attached to a chain or hook that is fixed in place. Escaping the Manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check as an action. Bursting them requires a successful DC 25 Strength (Athletics) check as an action.

Each set of Manacles comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use Thieves’ Tools to pick the Manacles’ lock with a successful [[/tool thief dex 15]] check.
translation:
以一个利用动作，你可以进行一次DC 13 的敏捷（巧手）检定。如果该检定成功，你能利用镣铐捆住一个位于你 5 尺内的非自愿且体型不超过中型的生物，但该生物必须处于 &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], 或 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。如果你铐住了该生物，该生物进行的攻击检定会具有劣势。如果镣铐还被锁链或钩子固定在了某处，该生物还会陷入束缚状态。挣脱镣铐需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC 20 的敏捷（巧手）检定。扯坏镣铐需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC 25 的力量（运动）检定。

每套镣铐都有对应的钥匙。如果没有对应的钥匙，一个生物还可以使用盗贼工具来通过一次 [[/tool thief dex 15]] 检定解开镣铐的锁。

original: If you consult an accurate Map, you gain a +5 bonus to Wisdom (Survival) checks you make to find your way in the place represented on it.
translation: 如果你查阅了一张准确的地图，你在进行感知（求生）检定以找到地图上所示地点的路线时，会获得+5的加值。

original:
When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a Net. Target a creature you can see within 15 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or have the &Reference[Restrained] condition until it escapes. The target succeeds automatically if it is Huge or larger.

To escape, the target or a creature within 5 feet of it must take an action to make a [[/skill ath 10]] check, freeing the Restrained creature on a success. Destroying the Net (AC 10; 5 HP; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage) also frees the target, ending the effect.
translation:
当你执行攻击动作，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一张捕网。你可以选择位于你 15 尺内可见的一个生物作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，直至挣脱。体型是巨型及以上的目标将自动通过豁免。

被束缚的目标或者位于目标 5 尺内的生物，可以通过一个动作来进行一次 [[/skill ath 10]] 检定。若检定成功，被束缚的生物将被解放。摧毁捕网（AC 10；5 HP；免疫钝击、毒素和心灵伤害）也能解放被困目标并结束捕网的效果。

original: One sheet of Paper can hold about 250 handwritten words.
translation: 一张纸可以书写大约250个手写单词。

original: Perfume comes in a 4-ounce vial. For 1 hour after applying Perfume to yourself, you have Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to influence an Indifferent Humanoid within 5 feet of yourself.
translation: 香水通常装在 4 盎司的小瓶里。为自己拍上香水后的 1 小时里，你为影响对你态度冷漠的类人生物所作的魅力（游说）检定都具有优势，但这个生物必须位于你的 5 尺内。

original:
As a Bonus Action, you can use a vial of Basic Poison to coat one weapon or up to three pieces of ammunition. A creature that takes Piercing or Slashing damage from the poisoned weapon or ammunition takes an extra 1d4 Poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute or until its damage is dealt, whichever comes first.

Foundry Note

This feature includes a roll for the Poison damage.
translation:
作为一个附赠动作，你可以使用一瓶基础毒药来涂抹一件武器或多达三发弹药。一个生物如果被涂有毒药的武器或弹药造成穿刺或斩击伤害，则额外受到1d4毒素伤害。一旦涂抹，毒药在1分钟内或直到其伤害被造成，以先到者为准，保持效力

Foundry Note

特性包含毒素伤害的掷骰行动。

original: A Pole is 10 feet long. You can use it to touch something up to 10 feet away. If you must make a Strength (Athletics) check as part of a High or Long Jump, you can use the Pole to vault, giving yourself Advantage on the check.
translation: 杆子长10尺。你可以用它触碰到10尺远的东西。如果你需要在进行高跳或跳远时进行力量（运动）检定，你可以使用杆子进行撑杆跳，使你在这次检定中获得优势。

original: An Iron Pot holds up to 1 gallon.

This potion is a magic item. As a Bonus Action, you can drink it or administer it to another creature within 5 feet of yourself. The creature that drinks the magical red fluid in this vial regains 2d4 + 2 Hit Points.
translation: 这瓶药水是一种魔法物品。以一个附赠动作，你可以喝掉它或将它喂给位于你 5 尺内的其他生物。喝掉这小瓶魔法红色液体的生物能够恢复 2d4 + 2 点生命值。

original: A Pouch holds up to 6 pounds within one-fifth of a cubic foot.
translation: 一个小袋可以在五分之一立方尺的体积内装下多达 6 磅的重量。

original: A Priest’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBlanket0000]{Blanket}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolyWater00]{Holy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 7 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRobe0000000]{Robe}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.
translation: 祭司套组包含以下物品： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{背包}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBlanket0000]{毯子}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHolyWater00]{圣水}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{油灯}, 7 天份@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{口粮}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRobe0000000]{法袍}和@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{火绒盒}。
一个箭袋可以装多达 20 支箭。

original: You can use a Portable Ram to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus to the Strength check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you Advantage on this check.
translation: 你可以使用便携式攻城锤破坏门。这样做时，你在力量检定中获得+4加值。另一个角色可以帮助你使用攻城锤，使你在这次检定中获得优势。

original: A Sack holds up to 30 pounds within 1 cubic foot.
translation: 麻袋至多能够装入 30 磅、1 立方尺的东西。

original: A Scholar’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBook0000000]{Book}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000]{Ink}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInkPen00000]{Ink Pen}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}, 10 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 10 sheets of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00]{Parchment}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}.
translation: >学者套组包含以下物品：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{背包}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBook0000000]{书本}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInk00000000]{墨水}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagInkPen00000]{墨水笔}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{油灯}, 10 瓶@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{灯油}, 10 张 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagParchment00]{羊皮纸} 和@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{火绒盒}。

original: Working for 1 hour, you can use a Shovel to dig a hole that is 5 feet on each side in soil or similar material.
translation: 你可以使用铲子来花费 1 小时时间在土地或类似材质的地方挖出一个 5 尺边长的洞。

original: When blown as a Utilize action, a Signal Whistle produces a sound that can be heard up to 600 feet away.
translation: 以一个利用动作，你可以吹响一支信号笛，并使信号笛发出 600 尺外都可以听见的响声。

original:
A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCantripScro]{Spell Scroll (Cantrip)} or Spell Scroll (Level 1) is a magic item that bears the words of a cantrip or level 1 spell, respectively, determined by the scroll’s creator. If the spell is on your class’s spell list, you can read the scroll and cast the spell using its normal casting time and without providing any Material components.

If the spell requires a saving throw or an attack roll, the spell save DC is 13, and the attack bonus is +5. The scroll disintegrates when the casting is completed.
translation:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCantripScro] 或一环法术卷轴是一种记载了戏法或一环法术的魔法物品。具体是哪一种由卷轴的创造者决定。如果卷轴的法术处在你的职业法术列表中，你就可以阅读这卷卷轴并在无需材料的情况下，使用法术的正常施法时间来施展这道法术。

如果法术要求豁免检定或攻击检定，法术的DC则为 13，而攻击加值为 5。当法术施展完毕，卷轴会立刻烟消云散。

original: Iron Spikes come in bundles of ten. As a Utilize action, you can use a blunt object, such as a Light Hammer, to hammer a spike into wood, earth, or a similar material. You can do so to jam a door shut or to then tie a Rope or Chain to the Spike.
translation: 铁钉以十根一捆的形式出售。作为一个利用动作，你可以使用钝器，比如轻锤，将钉子锤入木头、土壤或类似的材料。你可以这样做来卡住门或将绳索或铁链绑在钉子上。

original: Objects viewed through a Spyglass are magnified to twice their size.
translation: 从望远镜中观察到的物品能放大两倍。

original: String is 10 feet long. You can tie a knot in it as a Utilize action.
translation: 绳子长 10 尺。你可以作为利用动作在它上面打一个结。

original: A Tent sleeps up to two Small or Medium creatures.
translation: 个帐篷可以容纳多达两个小型或中型生物。
一个小瓶可以容纳最多4盎司。

translation: 你必须拥有盾牌的受训才能从一面盾牌中获得其护甲等级的增益。

original: A @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu]{Druidic Focus} takes one of the forms in the Druidic Focuses table and is carved, tied with ribbon, or painted to channel primal magic. A Druid or Ranger can use such an object as a Spellcasting Focus.
translation: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagDruidicFocu] 采用德鲁伊法器表中的一种形态，并被雕刻、系上丝带或涂上颜色来引导原始魔法。德鲁伊或游侠可以使用这样的物体作为施法的法器。
